scripts.text:
Insert into logging.Piplinerun (Piplinerun, PiplineName, PiplineStartTime, PiplineEndTime, PiplineStatus)
Values(
    '(@pipeline().RunId)'
    '(@pipeline().Pipeline)'
    GetUTCDATE(),
    Null,
    'Starting'

)

Update logging.piplinerun
set
    PiplineEndTime = GETUTCDATE(),
    PiplineStatus = '@{activity('load').status}'
where
    PiplineID = '@{pipline().RunID}'
    and PiplineStauts = 'Starting'
